extension.description:
Joomla 3 EOL Security Fixes
Original Author: Tom van der Laan (TLWebdesign)
Updated & Maintained by: N8Solutions (2026)
This extension applies critical security backports to Joomla 3.10.12 sites to protect against vulnerabilities discovered after the official EOL.

2026 Update Notes:
- Added fix for Pagebreak XSS (CVE-2025-63083)
- Added fix for Data URL Filtering (CVE-2025-63082)
- Added fix for Media Manager RCE (CVE-2025-22213)
- Added fix for Database SQL Injection (CVE-2025-25226)

This tool auto-uninstalls itself immediately after replacing the necessary core files.
